name: jira

metadata.description:
Jira Sensor


Creates an issue on jira.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed
Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • project
  • message
  • subject
  • type (Task, Bug ...) (optional)
  • JIRA_USER
  • JIRA_PASSWORD
  • JIRA_URL
